verses.verse: And the men <WH582> of Kirjathjearim <WH7157> came, <WH935> and fetched <WH5927> up the ark <WH727> of the LORD, <WH3068> and brought <WH935> it into <WH413> the house <WH1004> of Abinadab <WH41> in the hill, <WH1389> and sanctified <WH6942> Eleazar <WH499> his son <WH1121> to keep <WH8104> the ark <WH727> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And it came <WH1961> to pass, while <WH3117> the ark <WH727> stayed <WH3427> in Kirjathjearim, <WH7157> that the time <WH3117> was long; <WH7235> for it was twenty <WH6242> years: <WH8141> and all <WH3605> the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> lamented <WH5091> after <WH310> the LORD. <WH3068>

And Samuel <WH8050> spoke <WH559> to all <WH3605> the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> If <WH518> you do return <WH7725> to the LORD <WH3068> with all <WH3605> your hearts, <WH3824> then put <WH5493> away <WH5493> the strange <WH5236> gods <WH430> and Ashtaroth <WH6252> from among <WH8432> you, and prepare <WH3559> your hearts <WH3824> to the LORD, <WH3068> and serve <WH5647> him only: <WH905> and he will deliver <WH5337> you out of the hand <WH3027> of the Philistines. <WH6430>
Then the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did put <WH5493> away <WH5493> Baalim <WH1168> and Ashtaroth, <WH6252> and served <WH5647> the LORD <WH3068> only. <WH905>
And Samuel <WH8050> said, <WH559> Gather <WH6908> all <WH3605> Israel <WH3478> to Mizpeh, <WH4708> and I will pray <WH6419> for you to the LORD. <WH3068>

And they gathered <WH6908> together to Mizpeh, <WH4709> and drew <WH7579> water, <WH4325> and poured <WH8210> it out before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> and fasted <WH6684> on that day, <WH3117> and said <WH559> there, <WH8033> We have sinned <WH2398> against the LORD. <WH3068> And Samuel <WH8050> judged <WH8199> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in Mizpeh. <WH4708>

And when the Philistines <WH6430> heard <WH8085> that the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> were gathered <WH6908> together to Mizpeh, <WH4708> the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> went <WH5927> up against <WH413> Israel. <WH3478> And when the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> heard <WH8085> it, they were afraid <WH3372> of the Philistines. <WH6430>

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> said <WH559> to Samuel, <WH8050> Cease <WH2790> not to cry <WH2199> to the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> for us, that he will save <WH3467> us out of the hand <WH3027> of the Philistines. <WH6430>

And Samuel <WH8050> took <WH3947> a sucking <WH2461> lamb, <WH2924> and offered <WH5927> it for a burnt <WH5930> offering wholly <WH3632> to the LORD: <WH3068> and Samuel <WH8050> cried <WH2199> to the LORD <WH3068> for Israel; <WH3478> and the LORD <WH3068> heard <WH6030> him.

And as Samuel <WH8050> was offering <WH5927> up the burnt <WH5930> offering, the Philistines <WH6430> drew near <WH5066> to battle <WH4421> against Israel: <WH3478> but the LORD <WH3068> thundered <WH7481> with a great <WH1419> thunder <WH6963> on that day <WH3117> on the Philistines, <WH6430> and discomfited <WH1949> them; and they were smitten <WH5062> before Israel. <WH3478>

And the men <WH582> of Israel <WH3478> went <WH3318> out of Mizpeh, <WH4709> and pursued <WH7291> the Philistines, <WH6430> and smote <WH5221> them, until <WH5704> they came under <WH8478> Bethcar. <WH1033>

Then Samuel <WH8050> took <WH3947> a stone, <WH68> and set <WH7760> it between <WH996> Mizpeh <WH4709> and Shen, <WH8129> and called <WH7121> the name <WH8034> of it Ebenezer, <WH72> saying, <WH559> Till now <WH5704> <WH2008> has the LORD <WH3068> helped <WH5826> us.

So the Philistines <WH6430> were subdued, <WH3665> and they came <WH935> no <WH3808> more <WH3254> <WH5750> into the coast <WH1366> of Israel: <WH3478> and the hand <WH3027> of the LORD <WH3068> was against the Philistines <WH6430> all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Samuel. <WH8050>

And the cities <WH5892> which <WH834> the Philistines <WH6430> had taken <WH3947> from Israel <WH3478> were restored <WH7725> to Israel, <WH3478> from Ekron <WH6138> even to Gath; <WH1661> and the coasts <WH1366> thereof did Israel <WH3478> deliver <WH5337> out of the hands <WH3027> of the Philistines. <WH6430> And there was peace <WH7965> between <WH996> Israel <WH3478> and the Amorites. <WH567>
And Samuel <WH8050> judged <WH8199> Israel <WH3478> all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of his life. <WH2416>

And he went <WH1980> from year <WH8141> to year <WH8141> in circuit <WH5437> to Bethel, <WH1008> and Gilgal, <WH1537> and Mizpeh, <WH4709> and judged <WH8199> Israel <WH3478> in all <WH3605> those <WH428> places. <WH4725>

And his return <WH8666> was to Ramah; <WH7414> for there <WH8033> was his house; <WH1004> and there <WH8033> he judged <WH8199> Israel; <WH3478> and there <WH8033> he built <WH1129> an altar <WH4196> to the LORD. <WH3068>
